schema.description: Code agent helps you with productivity in using an editor and performing actions like creating files, editor customization, writing code, intelligent code suggestions, real-time error detection, debugging, and source control tasks etc.
Code agent that helps you debug code including handling actions like showing the debug panel, adding/toggling breakpoints, stepping in/out of code etc.
Code agent that helps you work with display keyboard bindings, Zoom in, Zoom out, do text search and replace, show extensions etc.
Code agent that helps you perform actions like finding a file, go to a symbol or a line in a file, Open new vscode window, show the command palette, user settings json etc.
